name: Battle Pixels (itch)
description:
Battle Pixels is a frantic arcade action, point and click shoot 'em up with a 16bit retro style.

Take control of your tanks and eliminate the turret defences over 25 randomly generated levels. Use the point and click attack controls to guide your tanks and engage in combat.

Each level has it's own set of unique features including: airstrikes, mines, guided missiles, barrier defences and conveyor belts.
Unlock each of the levels and buy power-ups to help you along the way.

Enjoy the destruction.

If you like what you see please visit, comment and support.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/434500/

Battle Pixels is now available on Android. Please download to your phone or tablet.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appyart.battlepixels&hl=en
